bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu sun 虛損 , depletion detriment. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry fang feng 防 風：五勞七傷，羸損盜汗，心煩體重，能安神定思 , “The five types of exhaustion and the seven types of harm; emaciation detriment , and robber sweat, heart vexation and a feeling of a heavy body. It is able to pacify the spirit and to stabilize thoughts”.
